casebody.data:
YALLUM
v.
HAMMERLE. No. 513P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005.

Sandra F. Yallum, Pro Se.

R. Locke Bell, for Dennis & Barbara Hammerle. David W. Smith, III, Gastonia, for Moss & Moss Realty. Jim R. Funderurk, for Alan G. Cloninger.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of August 2005 by Plaintiffs for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
